Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Westbound Reroute near Montrose Beach
ShortDescription: Westbound 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Wilson, Marine Drive and Montrose: due to, street blockage near Montrose Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Marine Drive, Montrose and over regular route, due to street blockage near Montrose Beach.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
